description: Defines the AccessControl struct with static methods for managing ownership and permissions of filesystem nodes, using POSIX system calls on POSIX systems.

classes.name: AccessControl
classes.description: Provides static methods to set ownership and permissions on filesystem nodes, abstracting platform-specific details.

methods.name: uint32_t OwnerShip(const string & node,const string & userName,const string & groupName)
methods.description: Sets the ownership of a node to specified user and group, using POSIX system calls.

methods.name: uint32_t Permission(const string & node,const uint16_t modeFlags)
methods.description: Sets permission modes on a filesystem node.

methods.name: uint32_t Apply(const Core::NodeId & node)
methods.description: Applies ownership and permission settings to a NodeId object.

ctags.name: OwnerShip
ctags.pattern: /^        static uint32_t OwnerShip(const string& node, const string& userName, const string& grou/
ctags.signature: (const string & node,const string & userName,const string & groupName)

ctags.name: Permission
ctags.pattern: /^        static uint32_t Permission(const string& node, const uint16_t modeFlags){$/
